title: Top 10 price-is-no-object, dream destinations [Photos]
text:
Tuesday, July 14, 2015 06:00 AM MDT Top 10 price-is-no-object, dream destinations Previous Next 
If price was no object, where would you travel? According to a new survey from luxury travel network Virtuoso , wealthy travellers flush with cash dream of holidaying in Australia, Italy and New Zealand. Virtuoso surveyed more than 5,800 travellers from 60 countries in their poll. Find the top 10 price-is-no-object, dream destinations in our photo gallery. (Fotolia) 
1. Australia. (Fotolia) Travel Trends
